message.body: Thanks cuz. Almost. How are you.
Cuz! Are you ready for your trip!? So excited for you!
Haha oh hb. Yeah we are taking 10 suitcases. 8 are ours. Been cleaning so we come home to a clean house.
Thanks. It should be fun. Going for two weeks. Can't wait for the warm weather.
Good! Was just talking to HB she was telling me about your packing. Wanted to wish you safe travels!
Holy crap!
Yes. Thank goodness.
We will I bought beach toys today at Walmart.
How's hunter.
You guys secretly get married yet. Haha.
That's so many bags! Are they all wheel suitcases?
Tell me about it. It's rainy and cold here. Hope you guys get to go to the beach
Awesomeeee. He's good! Except our sewage line went
Oh geez. That doesn't sound like fun.
Haha. He's a handy one too?
Haha. Is the secrets marriage coming soon.
So he's been wetvacking shit for a week
NOT YET.
Thank goodness.
Not that I know of!! You will know if secret marriage happens I promise!
Ok thanks. I keep thinking one day. I'm
He just applied for an artist residency in New Mexico
And I told him if he gets it (it's two years) we marry before he goes
Oh wow. So you could be moving.
Smart girls.
Well, I would stay here maybe? I make more Menu than him.
Money
Oh well that makes sense. Two years isn't that bad.
He might not get it though so I'm not stressing about it yet
Ha
Oh I'm the opposite. I'd be stressing until I hear. Haha
It's hard not to think about it!
What day do you all get back?
We leave Sunday and land at Dulles on the 14.
Coooool. I just confirmed last night I'll be in Paris speaking at a conference while you are in Peru. We are jet setters!
Oh wow!!!!! That's soooo awesome! Yeah I don't mind traveling. Enjoy it. It's just the added stress of three kids. Hahaha. So enjoy the easy traveling while you can
Haha I stress out so much without kids I can't even imagine! But you are my idol for doing it!
Gives me courage for the future.
Ha

Thanks. It's not hard. The hardest part is planning. I've tried to get help from my in laws but that isn't happening. So I just get it done. Kids might get ignored or the iPad's might be their babysitters. But hey they are ok! Haha
It seems like you are doing it right. Who's taking you guys to the airport (or do you park the car there?)
We have to take two cars. So ours and celia is driving her van.
Then they will bring our car back to the house
I see
Oh good! Paying to park for two weeks is expensive!
We'll have an awesome trip. If I get secret married in the next two weeks I'll send you an email! Love you guys!
Thanks so much. Love to you guys!!
